Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball apologized for his offensive comment made during a live interview after the Hornets' game against the Cleveland Cavaliers on November 17, 2024.
Hornets head coach Charles Lee emphasized that the organization does not condone such comments and highlighted the importance of maintaining a respectful environment.
Others: LaMelo Ball was fined $100,000 by the NBA for his offensive and derogatory comment.
Ball is in his fifth season with the Charlotte Hornets and is averaging 29.6 points, 6.3 assists, and 5.3 rebounds this season.
